item.title: Leaves need clearing, 13th October
item.description:
• Please give brief details of your complaint or compliment below: Please can you explain to me how when a tree in my road sheds its leaves and they get blown into my garden. And I bag them up and put them in My bin , my bin doesn’t get emptied? • What action (if any) would you like us to take? Clean the streets
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Scotts Lane, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned unidentifiable shopping trolley, 13th October
item.description:
Reported 4 times over 4 weeks to Trolleywise but not removed. I don’t know what to do. Have had to tie the trolley to my fence as it kept rolling into the road & is dangerous. Any advice appreciated as I don’t want to just move it elsewhere

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Hadrian Street, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More filth from the new arrivals, 13th October
item.description:

item.title: Huge tree, 13th October
item.description:
This tree is on the pavement outside our property. I reported it needed trimming 2 years ago. The pavement is affected, roots have moved the stones that edge the pavement. The branches are overhanging our house causing guttering to block. Excessive leaf fall is ridiculous. Our neighbour had similar problems and have had their pollarded. Could you please do the same outside number 1.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fairfield Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish, mainly food packaging and drink bottles, collects continuously along/behind and I front of the wall of the former Grape and Grain. It appears that Bromley never cleans this area at the top of Anerley Hill, and the owners, Wetherspoons, takes no responsibility for maintaining their site., 13th October
